text: Common contributing factors to mechanical injury Patient risk factors Physical factors Physiological factors * Gender (M > F) * Compression * Hypoxia * Age ® Stretch * Hypotension * Obesity * Sharp trauma * Dehydration * Frailty * Shear * Hypothermia * Diabetes * Temperature * Electrolyte * Neuropathy (burns) disturbance * Smoking © Steroids ® Vascular disease
